news.title: ‘You can only imagine the knock on the door for those families’ – five young friends die in nation’s worst road tragedy for 15 years
news.summary: Communities have spoken of their devastation after five young friends died and three others were left injured after a horrific two-car collision that left one vehicle engulfed in flames.

news.title: ‘Pillar of society’ Pat Salmon (89) jailed for three years for historical abuse of five-year-old girl
news.summary: An 89-year-old “self-proclaimed pillar of society” has been jailed for three years for the historical sexual assault of a five-year-old child.

news.title: Dominik Szoboszlai’s tetchy interview and disrespecting Troy Parrott: Hungarian civil war after shock loss to Ireland
news.summary: Supporters and the media in Hungary have turned on the team and their manager, Marco Rossi, as they woke up to the fact that their World Cup dream is over.

news.title: ‘We are not a rubber stamp’ – court not satisfied with Kinahan chief Sean McGovern's application for free legal aid
news.summary: The Special Criminal Court has said it is still not satisfied with documentation provided by Sean McGovern, who has applied for legal aid after being charged with murder and directing a criminal organisation.

news.title: Two men sentenced to life for ‘brutal’ murder of ‘amazing brother and super son’ who was beaten to death on Dublin street
news.summary: Two men have been sentenced to life imprisonment for the "brutal" murder of a "good friend, amazing brother and super son" who was taking his last step towards fulfilling his life when he was beaten to death on a Dublin street.

news.title: Tyrone footballer Conor Meyler takes defamation case against the Irish Post over article
news.summary: Tyrone senior intercounty footballer Conor Meyler has taken a defamation action against the Irish Post over an article published in January this year.

news.title: ‘People have no idea, I would absolutely love a baby’ – Bonnie Ryan opens up about fertility struggle
news.summary: Influencer and podcaster Bonnie Ryan has opened up about her fertility journey, something she said she has kept to herself for years.

news.title: Wicklow woman who drowned on Saturday was trying to save her family pet
news.summary: The woman who tragically drowned on Saturday in Wicklow has been named as Herbst Software director Wendy Maxine Herbst of Kilpoole Hill Farm, the home of Polo Wicklow.

news.title: ‘I’ll finish my contract, let’s do that first’ – Heimir Hallgrimsson happy to bide time on new deal talks after Hungary heroics
news.summary: Heimir Hallgrimsson has indicated that he could be happy to wait until after the World Cup play-offs to hold discussions about his future.

news.title: I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here! review: No local interest for the Irish yet but the show wisely goes back to basics
news.summary: The BBC may be run these days by woke activists prepared to trash the corporation’s hard won reputation just to score a few points over their ideological enemies on the right, but at least there are no ads.
